articles.title: Chandrayaan 3 set to land on Moon: Throwback to when India intentionally crashed its spacecraft on lunar surfa - CNBCTV18
articles.description: In 2008, India intentionally crashed its Chandrayaan spacecraft on the lunar surface. The impact probe was the first such endeavour to hint at the probability of water on the Moon’s surface which was later confirmed by NASA.
